WRITING.TEXT: Why does Terrorist Hunt have half the FPS as Casual and Ranked. Is their a setting i can change or is this for everyone?

WRITING.TITLE: Defender buff (if you can call it that)
WRITING.TEXT:
Roamers and Trappers may not have the time time to reinforce during prep phase or maybe roamers just wanna get out of the Obj room. This leaves a breachable hatch or wall that can easy be breached giving the attackers and additional entry point possibly costing the game.
Give defenders the option the drop their Reinforced wall to allow other operators to pick them up and put them to use.
